root.name: The Bunny Game
root.description: OverviewThe Bunny Game is an board game that is an indie game. It costs 80 MSP, or Microsoft points, which is equivalent to $1.00. It is up to two players. Players roll a die to see how many spaces they go. There are positive and negative spaces that both have equal effects. Example: "Oops! you landed on a mud patch! Go back 2 spaces!" or " You landed on a spring! Move forward 2 spaces!"
